content.rendered:
Gedalia | Energy Healer

Welcome to my online healing space.

I’ve helped hundreds of women eliminate stress, anxiety, depression, grief, loss, improve hormonal imbalance, and weight loss.  By awakening the body’s healing potential and increasing energy flow women feel grounded, have improved sleep, feel unburdened emotionally, lose weight naturally, feel vitality, increased creativity, and a renewed sense of well being.

As a mind-body therapist / energy healer, I focus on unblocking and increasing energy flow with a rare anti-aging healing modality called ” Marma”. Marma is a hands-on therapy (with the client fully clothed) using acupressure points, essential oils, gemstones, sound-Tibetan bowls and ends with Polarity therapy. All the benefits of Acupuncture with no needles.

How can I help you return to vibrant health and inner peace?

  • Sign Up For My Weekly Holistic Tips Blog
  • See My Services
  • Don’t take my word for it: Read Testimonials from women I have already helped
  • Read my paperback guide: Enough Drugs! I Am a Woman and Can Heal Naturally: A practical guide to feeling your best

The Enough Drugs! guide empowers women with a wealth of holistic gems to reclaim vibrant health and inner peace.
For those seeking an alternative to a reliance on prescription drugs, or for those seeking a holistic lifestyle,
the author clearly distills the benefits of creativity, meditation, movement, Ayurveda, vibrational healing
and shows you how to get started on a path to healing and wholeness.

content.rendered:
Services

What to Expect

Each session will last 60 minutes. It is recommended that a client questionnaire and consult form be filled out prior to your session. (See below)

Your first session can include a tongue and pulse evaluation based on Ayurveda.

During your healing session (fully clothed) you may experience insights, see colors, feel tingling or warmth and have a deep feeling of peace and calm.

Following your session, you will be provided with recommendations such as essential oils, herbs, meditation, diet, and gemstones.                

[/vc_column_text][mk_divider divider_width=”one_half”][mk_padding_divider][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Office Visit

 Marma therapy-One Hour- $175

Marmas are the junction or entry points between body, mind, and emotions. Gently pressing these points along the front and back of the body increases vital energy flow for restoration and rejuvenation, awakening your inner healing system. Marma is anti-aging and also rejuvenates the skin.

Essential oils, gemstones, and sound are part of this unique mind/body therapy.

Package of Three Sessions- $475 (Valid for three months from the first session)

Remote sessions are also available by phone.

Schedule a free 20 minute /question/strategy session

678-357-3443

 

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Whole Health Home Visit for Women- balancing your inner and outer home.

First Hour- $185

No traffic, no stress, I come right to your own home!

We will begin by tuning and balancing your inner being with “Marma Therapy”. Marma points are the junction between mind/body and emotions. When gently pressed along the front and back of the body this gentle pressure will restore and rejuvenate your entire being. Marma is like going on a vacation except the results are lasting.

Essential oils, sound, and gemstones are used to harmonize the vibrational frequencies of your body/mind. You will feel a renewed glow.

 

 Second Hour (optional)- $100

Your outer home needs to reflect the harmony and balance you need to maintain your new vibe.

You may want to know, “Where is the ideal spot in my home for a sacred space?”

” What are some easy yoga postures I can do at home”? ” What colors will uplift or calm me and my family?” ” What essential oils should I use at home”?

You will have all the answers and inspiration you need to balance your inner and outer home!

 

Cash or checks are accepted. Credit Cards accepted with 4% processing fee added.

[/vc_column_text][mk_divider divider_width=”one_half”][/vc_column][/vc_row][mk_page_section][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Prior to your visit, please complete these forms and bring with you to your first appointment.

Client Questionnaire

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][mk_padding_divider size=”80″][mk_image src=”http://gedaliahealingarts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/GooglePickerAPI_Genin-marma-1.jpg” image_width=”350″ image_height=”200″ crop=”false” hover=”false”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Gedalia is a Naturopath, Mind/body healer, teacher, writer, and artist.

There’s a bridge between mind and body and that is emotional wellness. For more than 15 years she has helped women uncover new pathways to health and vitality by drawing on a wealth of holistic gems: Ayurveda, meditation, breathwork, essential oils, gemstones, Marma, sound healing, nutritional advice, herbs, yoga postures, and even creativity. 

Gedalia’s approach is unique, individualized,  highly skilled and intuitive. Rather than medicate or over supplement, Gedalia aims to unblock and reenergize the flow of energy in the body to clear the pathways for optimal health.

 Her energy sessions serve as a diagnostic and assessment space for recommendations that follow as well as a deep and restorative experience for the client. Even those who have faced lifelong emotional pain or suffering leave her sessions feeling renewed.

Gedalia’s book ” Enough Drugs I am a Woman and Can Heal Naturally– a practical guide to feeling your best”- offers a clear-eyed picture of holistic tools that empower women to take back their health on all levels; body, mind, and spirit.

Gedalia shares her compassion, wisdom and highly intuitive skills with her women clients.

When she began meditating in 1990 she was drawn to the healing arts and painting. Through discovering her creativity and natural gifts the pain and grief she had suffered began to transform and she began to see and experience the world from a new lens. She now awakens women to their own innate gifts by supporting them to pay attention to their own self-care and joy.

Gedalia  holds a PhD in Traditional Naturopathy, a four-year certificate in hands-on healing and the human energy field as well as an Ayurvedic Certificate from New Mexico and Reiki Master certification.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][mk_divider][mk_padding_divider][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Experience 

• Centre Spring MD.- Worked with nationally known Integrative doctor Dr. Taz as Ayurvedic Health Specialist, Mind-Body Healer Brookhaven, Georgia. 2010-8/2018
• Created and taught a holistic approach to Grief and Loss class for CE credits. 2015-2017
• Conducted monthly classes on various holistic topics such as seasonal nutrition, essential oils, Ayurveda, chakras, and Marma.
• Keynote speaker at Sound Healing conference-2015
• Conducted programs for college students using aromatherapy to improve learning. Oglethorpe College 2014
• Guest appearance on the Weather Channel to discuss natural remedies for fall allergies, 2014.
• A regular contributor to Everyday Ayurveda, The The Atlanta Jewish Times, Ayurveda Mantra magazine, Sivana East, and Medium.com.  See Press page for all Media.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Education & Training

• Ph.D. in Traditional Naturopathy- Natural Health, with over 15 years’ experience in offering energy healing as well as teaching and consulting on women’s health.
• Graduated Honors with B.S. in Natural Health and Doctor of Naturopathy from Clayton College of Natural Health, 2004.
• Completed four-year training program with world-renowned energy healer, teacher, and writer, Dr. Michael Mamas. Studies included 600 hours of hands on healing and mind/body relationship exploration. www.mountsoma.org. 2000
• Completed Marma Therapy training with Vasant Lad, Ayurveda physician and founder of the Ayurvedic Institute, Albuquerque, New Mexico. 2011
• Received an Ayurveda Certificate upon completion of training with Vasant Lad in a clinical setting in Pune, India. 2012
• Reiki Master Certification, 1995
• Student of Siddha Yoga Meditation since 1990.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][mk_divider][mk_padding_divider][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row visibility=”visible-dt”][vc_column width=”1/4″][mk_padding_divider size=”60″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][mk_padding_divider size=”60″][vc_column_text][URIS id=9696][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_column_text]Artist Bio

As I began meditating in 1990  I was naturally drawn to studying and experiencing the healing arts. Painting and using color became a natural expression of what I was feeling inside. I also copied in pastel from famous artists like Wolf Kahn to further understand painting.

I realized then that for the many issues I was dealing with in my body, the painting and color had transformed my experience of myself and the world around me. It was this realization and the practice of art that healed my body and heart. This outpouring of energy in the form of creativity continues to be a part of my daily life.

I share these paintings with you with an intention of inspiring the creator within you.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row visibility=”hidden-dt”][vc_column width=”1/4″][mk_padding_divider size=”60″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][mk_padding_divider size=”60″][vc_column_text visibility=”hidden-dt”][URIS id=10595][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_column_text]

Associate Artist at Artists Atelier Gallery and Studio 

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Artist Bio

As I began meditating in 1990  I was naturally drawn to studying and experiencing the healing arts. Painting and using color became a natural expression of what I was feeling inside. I also copied in pastel from famous artists like Wolf Kahn to further understand painting.

I realized then that for the many issues I was dealing with in my body, the painting and color had transformed my experience of myself and the world around me. It was this realization and the practice of art that healed my body and heart. This outpouring of energy in the form of creativity continues to be a part of my daily life.

I share these paintings with you with an intention of inspiring the creator within you.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][mk_padding_divider size=”60″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][mk_padding_divider][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][mk_button style=”three-dimension” corner_style=”full_rounded” size=”large” bg_color=”#0080c6″ txt_color=”#dddddd” url=”mailto:gedaliagenin@gmail.com” target=”_blank” align=”center”]Click Here to Contact Gedalia by email or 678-357-3443[/mk_button][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][mk_padding_divider size=”5″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
